title: Media and Awareness
description: ADHR operates a YouTube channel with documentaries, talk shows, and short videos. Future goals include research publications, podcasts, and video platforms.

title: Empowering Farmers
description: We connect farmers to urban consumers and train them in organic farming, herbal cultivation, and forming Farmer Producer Organizations (FPOs).

title: Revival of Natural Resources
description: We restore natural water streams starting from Kunjetha village, engaging youth and experts to promote water conservation practices.

title: Promoting Sustainable Tourism
description: ADHR supports community-run homestays and cultural tourism in villages like Isoti to promote local heritage and boost income.

title: Education for Children
description: We provide online tuition and digital tools to children in remote villages, aiming to reduce migration and build strong local education systems.

title: Creating Employment Opportunities
description: Through training and initiatives like Skill India, we create jobs in tourism, agriculture, sports, and education sectors.
